mapper.select: SELECT review_seq , CONTENT , user_id , file_path , file_original_name , file_masking_name , CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW_FOR_STORE WHERE 1=1 AND review_seq = #{review_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into review_for_store (user_id, content, file_path, file_original_name, file_masking_name, create_date) values (#{user_id}, #{content}, #{file_path}, #{file_original_name}, #{file_masking_name}, SYSDATE());
